external_games.name: When Pigs Can Fly: Enter The Aporkalypse

name: When Pigs Can Fly: Enter The Aporkalypse
summary: In this apocalyptic SHMUP game, pigs are taking over the earth thanks to a zombie virus plaguing the worlds pig population. You are the hero of humanity and with the use of your biomechanical suit you can turn anything into a weapon.

videos.name: Trailer
